lmTest.name: Test species page rewrite 1
lmTest.description: Test species page rewrite rule with no taxon provided

lmTest.name: Test species page rewrite 2
lmTest.description: Test species page rewrite rule with no taxon provided (trailing slash)

lmTest.name: Test species page rewrite 3
lmTest.description: Test species page rewrite rule with taxon provided

lmTest.name: Algorithms XML URL forwarding test
lmTest.description: Tests that requests to the algorithms XML document are forwarded to the services machine

lmTest.name: Instances XML URL forwarding test
lmTest.description: Tests that requests to the instances XML document are forwarded to the services machine

lmTest.name: Client versions XML URL forwarding test
lmTest.description: Tests that requests to the client versions XML document are forwarded to the services machine

lmTest.name: Services XSL docuemnt URL forwarding test
lmTest.description: Tests that a request for the services XSL document is forwarded correctly to the services machine

lmTest.name: Species hint service URL forwarding test
lmTest.description: Tests that requests to the species hint service at lifemapper.org are correctly forwarded to the services machine

lmTest.name: Logout URL forwarding test
lmTest.description: Test that logout requests are forwarded correctly and the result is the login page

lmTest.name: Service response schema URL forwarding test
lmTest.description: Tests that a request to retrieve the service response XSD from lifemapper.org forwards to the services machine

lmTest.name: Signup page URL forwarding test
lmTest.description: Tests that requests to the signup page are forwarded correctly

lmTest.name: Base services page URL forwarding test
lmTest.description: Tests that requests to the base services page are forwarded correctly

lmTest.name: RAD services page URL forwarding test
lmTest.description: Tests that requests to the base RAD services page are forwarded correctly

lmTest.name: SDM services page URL forwarding test
lmTest.description: Test that requests to the base SDM services page are forwarded correctly

lmTest.name: Species page links URL forwarding test
lmTest.description: Tests that requests to the species links page are forwarded correctly to services machine

lmTest.name: Robots.txt URL forwarding test
lmTest.description: Tests taht requests to retrieve the robots.txt document are forwarded correctly
